title.rendered: SSHS Drama Club presents Pride and Prejudice on May 5 and 6

content.rendered: The Saratoga Springs High School Drama Club presents Pride and Prejudice on May 5 and 6 at 7:30 p.m. in the Loewenberg Auditorium.  Tickets are $10 and go on sale one hour prior to each performance.

excerpt.rendered: The Saratoga Springs High School Drama Club presents Pride and Prejudice on May 5 and 6 at 7:30 p.m. in the Loewenberg Auditorium.  Tickets are $10 and go on sale one hour prior to each performance.
